about_the_game:
Animal Jigsaw VR is a relaxing puzzle game that not only improves your mood, but also increases your knowledge with interesting content about a variety of animals and their habitats.

Take a deep breath and immerse yourself in nature.
Enter the beautiful, sunny savannah to socialize with cheetahs, or listen to the sounds of the trees in a peaceful meadow among deer. "Animal Jigsaw VR" pleasantly surprises with its graphics and faithful representation of animals.



An adventure you'll return to time and time again.
With over a dozen levels of varying difficulty, each with 3D puzzles of varying complexity and quantity, it's the perfect way to beat boredom any time of the year or day. Completing each level allows you to explore a new region and expand your animal collection.

More than just a game
"Animal Jigsaw VR" is not just great fun, it's also educational. Players can learn many new things about different animal species and their environments.



For young and old alike
Whether you're buying the game for yourself or your child, "Animal Jigsaw VR" is a game for anyone who loves animals, logic puzzles, and wants to explore the world.

name: Animal Jigsaw VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700HQ equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR

short_description: Animal Jigsaw VR is a relaxing 3D puzzle game about putting together realistic animals. Unlock animals and learn their fascinating stories. Immerse yourself in nature and gain a deeper understanding of the complex rules that govern the animal kingdom in a variety of environments.
